# tableView

**Instance Property**

The [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTableView] instance that this table header view belongs to.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var tableView: NSTableView? { get set }
```

## Discussion

You should never need to set this property; it’s assigned automatically when you set the header view for an `NSTableView`.

## Related Documentation

- **Table View Programming Guide for Mac**
- **headerView**: The view object used to draw headers over columns.
